song_title: Do Not Stand in the Shadows

Verse: Hearts which beat to a precise beat
Painting shadows on the wall
We'll cut out cars, drive by bars
All for one, one for all, ah
Like teenage sleaze and comic book cheese
With your heart on your sleeve
Well, you know you won't run and you won't hide
And you jump like a son of a gun, ow
Oh lonely, oh lonely
Watching people on my wall
Well, my Mama and Daddy thought they had me fooled
I wasn't thinking, not at all
Well, I got out, not gonna stand
In the dark without a light
Forget ill luck if you believe
That chance can sit and wait, wow
And now we've touched down, moving all around
Yeah, living to a blaster sound
No preachers, teachers freak out, man
To the sound of false alarm
They ain't here today, let me hear you say
You're alive and you're living with me
So don't try to hide, don't try to die
In the dark of the night, wow
Chorus: Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow, oh-oh
Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow
Dark and evil in the shadow, oh-oh
Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow, oh-oh
Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow, oh-oh-oh, oh-oh, rawr
[Guitar Solo]
Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow, oh-oh
Do not stand in the shadow

Do not stand in the shadow
Do not stand in the shadow
